translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

For the knowledge of Your Lordship today, by which His Excellency Sir December 12 last should be executed as soon as received by the authorities to whom they were addressed.

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of War Affairs in Caçapava, February 29, 1840. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Official letter of His Excellency February 29, received on March 12, ordering prompt execution of the provisions regarding passports.

Presidency Secretariat of the Republic To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of the Boqueirão Department. From the Minister of War. Caçapava.

Stamp on

Printed copy of a decree attached to document CV-138.
